author: Mark Hulbert
title: The Year’s Fund Returns Are In. Do They Matter?
text:
It’s January, which means it’s time for all those performance scoreboards, highlighting the top-performing financial advisers, investment-newsletter editors or mutual funds of the previous year.
These scorecards can provide some worthwhile information. But beware: They also can be hazardous to your wealth.
That is because sooner or later,...
